short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily collect documents to your AIO Vault and get them verified in real-time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download the AIO Chrome Extension to easily collect documents to your AIO Vault on your Chrome browser.

If you don't have an AIO Vault yet, please sign up before installing this extension at:
https://www.aio.network/

AIO is driving trust in business relationships, enabling people and businesses to establish and own their verified financial identity, and to share it securely with financial institutions. Using AIO you can establish your standing to any institution, backing it with verified documents from any trusted source - government, banks, insurance companies, utilities, legal and accounting firms, and more.

AIO Vault uses patented technology to help you collect digital documents directly from trusted data providers worldwide. We offer an effortless digital experience that protects your data privacy and helps you to collect and reuse verified documents to establish yourself through your own, self-sovereign, financial identity.

Contact us for support at:
support@aio.network
